thread.section_title: The Knife Merchant, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Knife Merchant, Inc | www.knifemerchant.com
thread.title: Samy Morcos:
thread.title_full: The Knife Merchant, Inc reviewed by Samy Morcos:

author: Samy Morcos:
title: Samy Morcos:
text:
Knife Merchant is all about customer service. This is my second set of knives purchased from them. I purchased a set of Dragon Chef's Knives. Awesome product! Incredibly balanced and sharp. They helped me decide between three different brands based on my preferences. They are super knowledgeable about the lines that they carry.
I will continue to be a repeat customer. They are passionate about what they do and it shows. Love these guys.
